feed.title: Coinbase reallocation to discourage Finney attacks

entry.title: Coinbase reallocation to discourage Finney attacks
entry.summary: The context suggests that the development list is not the appropriate platform to have a discussion about development. The writer requests anyone who wants to argue this point to do so on another thread or blog. The thread should be used for the discussion of the original proposal, ideally with the seriousness and dryness that a topic as nerdy as distributed consensus algorithms deserves.
